Key Arguments: The proposed legislation resembles a 'Ministry of Truth', which is considered evil.
The definition of misinformation excludes government and professional news content, which the author believes are not always reliable sources.
The COVID-19 vaccine rollout was based on incomplete testing phases, leading to misinformation about their safety and effectiveness.
Censorship of dissenting voices during the pandemic was harmful and prevented the truth from being heard.
The government was a source of misinformation during the pandemic, leading to excess deaths.
The legislation is seen as an insult to the intelligence of adults who can discern truth from misinformation.
Notable Quotes: I never thought that I would live to see the day when it would be proposed that Australia should have an honest to goodness Ministry of Truth.
The government lied and people died!
At the end of the day, the writings of George Orwell were indented to be a warning â€“ not an instruction manual!!
